entries: Staying alive among the scheming, ravenous undead of Geb required a deep knowledge of their motivations, capabilities, and weaknesses. More often than not, it also required the ability to weave alibis and life-preserving half-truths capable of swaying a stilled heart.
Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Charisma or Constitution, and one is a free ability boost.
You're trained in the {@skill Deception} skill and the {@skill Lore||Undead Lore} skill.
You gain the {@feat Charming Liar} skill feat.
